name: Samira Ebrahimi Kahou, Assistant Professor
research: My current research focuses on deep learning (generalization and interpretability), reinforcement learning, multi-modal learning, clinical decision support systems, climate modelling and disaster response.
prospective_students: Please send an email directly to samira.ebrahimi.kahou.lab@gmail.com. Start the subject with [MSc/PhD/Postdoc/Internship] followed by topic of interest and attach your CV.
